mapper.select: select table_name, table_type, table_catalog, table_schema, table_comment remark from information_schema.tables where table_schema = #{schema}
mapper.insert:
insert into metaData.t_metadata_db_table_temp (table_name, table_type, table_catalog, table_schema, remark) values
(#{item.tableName}, #{item.tableType}, #{item.tableCatalog}, #{item.tableSchema}, #{item.remark})

insert into metaData.t_metadata_db_table (table_name, table_type, table_catalog, table_schema, remark, update_time) select a.table_name, a.table_type, a.table_catalog, a.table_schema, a.remark, now() from metaData.t_metadata_db_table_temp a left join metaData.t_metadata_db_table b on a.table_name = b.table_name and a.table_schema = b.table_schema where b.table_name is null
mapper.select:
select * from metadata.t_metadata_db_table where 1 = 1
and table_schema = #{queryCond.schema}
and table_name like concat('%', #{queryCond.tableName}, '%')
and remark like concat('%', #{queryCond.remark}, '%')
order by table_name
